column1: * 1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing Letter to G.E. Selby (14 December 1937).
* 1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Arthur Ransome.
* 1956 – Linguist Patrick H. Wynne is born.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien signs three American editions of The Lord of the Rings for Allen.
* 2001 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 18 is published.
